messages.content:
The 2015 Met show was “Celebration of the Year of the Ram,” which included the jade set “Twelve animals of the Chinese zodiac.” The Met’s object description notes the snake sits with hands tucked in long sleeves, implying it’s the only one without a visible hand, so the other eleven show at least one hand. 
FINAL ANSWER: 11
